titleStmt.title: Englands friendly and seasonable advice to London The frownes of a friend, are better then the kisses of an enemy, saith Solomon.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing; date in Wing = 1648.
Supports the Army's desire, in June 1647, to remove eleven Members of Parliament and advises Londoners to be wary of Parliamentary despotism.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
